name: Brookfield Renewable Power Preferred Equity Inc. Class A Preference Shares Series 2
longDescription: Brookfield Renewable Power Preferred Equity Inc is an asset management company investing in real estate, infrastructure, renewable power, and private equity. The company engages in owning a portfolio of renewable power generating facilities in North America, Colombia, Brazil, Europe, India, and China. It operates in segments including hydroelectric, wind, solar, Energy transition and Corporate. The maximum revenue is generated from the hydroelectric segment in the North American region.

fullAddress: 181 Bay Street, Brookfield Place,Suite 300, P.O. Box 762, Toronto, ON, BM
